column1: Notes ^ a b c d e f g h i j Only includes plug-in electric passenger cars ^ a b c d e Registered light-duty plug-in stock in use at the end of the year ^ Includes registrations of used imports ^ Kei cars are not included for the Japanese market share estimate ^ a b Includes plug-in electric passenger cars and fully electric light-duty commercial vehicles ^ European figures correspond to European Union member countries plus the UK and three EFTA countries (Iceland, Norway and Switzerland) as per ACEA ^ Includes passenger plug-ins and heavy-duty commercial vehicles such as buses and trucks
